com.hortonworks.registries.tag.service

Interface TagService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CatalogTagService

    public interface TagService
    Interface for managing tags in the system. A storable entity in the system can be tagged with one or more tags and the tags can be nested. The implementation for this could be based on catalog db, or managed by external system like Atlas.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds a given Tag, or updates an existing tag in the system.

      Add a given Tag into the system.

      Tags the entity with the given tags
      List<TaggedEntity> getEntities(Long tagId, boolean recurse)
      Gets all the entities under the given tag id
      Tag getTag(Long tagId)
      Returns the Tag associated with the given tag id.
      List<Tag> getTags(TaggedEntity entityId)
      Return the list of all the tags associated with the given entity.
      Collection<Tag> listTags()
      List all the tags in the system.
      Collection<Tag> listTags(List<QueryParam> queryParams)
      Returns the list of tags matching the given query criteria.
      Tag removeTag(Long tagId)
      Removes the tag associated with the tag id from the system.
      void removeTagsFromStorable(TaggedEntity entityId, List<Tag> tags)
      Removes the given tags from the entity.

    • Method Detail

      • addTag

        Tag addTag(Tag tag)
        Add a given Tag into the system. This should also handle nested tags.
        Parameters:
        tag - the tag to add
        Returns:
        the added tag

      • addOrUpdateTag

        Tag addOrUpdateTag(Long tagId,
                   Tag tag)
        Adds a given Tag, or updates an existing tag in the system.
        Parameters:
        tagId - the unique id of the tag to be updated
        tag - the tag
        Returns:
        the added or updated tag

      • getTag

        Tag getTag(Long tagId)
        Returns the Tag associated with the given tag id.
        Parameters:
        tagId - the tag id
        Returns:
        the tag

      • removeTag

        Tag removeTag(Long tagId)
        Removes the tag associated with the tag id from the system. This could throw a TagNotEmptyException if the tag being removed has entities associated with it.
        Parameters:
        tagId - the tag id
        Returns:
        the removed tag

      • listTags

        Collection<Tag> listTags()
        List all the tags in the system.
        Returns:
        all the tags in the system.

      • listTags

        Collection<Tag> listTags(List<QueryParam> queryParams)
        Returns the list of tags matching the given query criteria.
        Parameters:
        queryParams - the query params
        Returns:
        the tags matching the query params
